results.description: Substitute Shea Gordon scores twice for 10-man Partick Thistle as they beat Morton to record their first home Scottish Championship win since April.
results.shortTitle: Thistle record first home win of season
results.title: Partick Thistle 2-1 Greenock Morton: Hosts record first home win of season

results.description: Morton kitman Andy Bryan has been given a 12-game suspension for breaching Scottish FA betting rules.
results.shortTitle: Morton kitman banned for betting breach
results.title: Morton kitman Andy Bryan given 12-game ban for gambling offences

results.description: Substitute Jamie Ness scored a fantastic late winner to gift Dundee an important home win over Greenock Morton.
results.title: Highlights: Dundee 2-1 Greenock Morton

results.description: Ayr United remain three points adrift of Dundee United at the top of the Scottish Championship after a frantic second-half against Morton.
results.shortTitle: Ayr come from behind to beat Morton
results.title: Morton 2-3 Ayr United: Visitors come from behind to earn win

results.description: Morton denies Inverness the chance to move second in the Scottish Championship after two goals from Bob McHugh's at Cappielow.
results.shortTitle: McHugh double as Morton beat Inverness
results.title: Greenock Morton 2-1 Inverness CT: Bob McHugh double for hosts

thumbnail.altText: Bob McHugh (right) celebrates his second goal for Morton

results.description: Bobby Linn's stunning free-kick edges out Greenock Morton at Gayfield Park and ends Arbroath's three-game losing run in the Scottish Championship.
results.title: Arbroath 1-0 Greenock Morton: Bobby Linn free-kick ends hosts' losing run

results.description: Jim McAlister's injury-time goal rescues a point for Morton after Andy Ryan's late strike had Dunfermline on course for a rare Scottish Championship win.
results.shortTitle: McAlister strikes at death to deny Pars
results.title: Morton 1-1 Dunfermline: Two goals in six minutes earn point apiece

thumbnail.altText: Dunfermline sit in ninth spot after just one win in five Championship games.

results.description: Championship leaders Dundee United are in irresistible form with Lawrence Shankland scoring a hat-trick as they thump Morton.
results.shortTitle: Shankland hat-trick as Dundee United hammer Morton
results.title: Dundee United 6-0 Greenock Morton

thumbnail.altText: Lawrence Shankland scored a hat-trick for Dundee United

results.description: Morton earn their first win in four matches to climb fourth in the Scottish Championship as Peter Grant's header is enough to beat Dundee.
results.shortTitle: Morton go fourth with first win in four
results.title: Greenock Morton 1-0 Dundee: Ton go fourth with first win in four

thumbnail.altText: Peter Grant celebrates Morton's win over Dundee

results.description: A first-half Faissal El Bakhtaoui goal earns Queen of the South their first Scottish Championship win of the season to beat Morton.
results.shortTitle: Queens grab first win of the campaign
results.title: Queen of the South 1-0 Greenock Morton

results.description: All the arrivals and departures during summer 2019 in the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Scottish Championship summer ins and outs
results.title: Scottish Championship ins and outs - Summer 2019

results.description: Dundee join city rivals Dundee United in being knocked out of the Challenge Cup third round after a 2-1 home defeat by League Two side Elgin City.
results.shortTitle: Both Dundee clubs out of Challenge Cup
results.title: Scottish Challenge Cup: Dundee lose to Elgin, Dundee United defeated on penalties by Arbroath

thumbnail.altText: Elgin's Shane Sutherland celebrates against Dundee

results.description: Inverness made short work of David Hopkin's Greenock Morton in a five-goal Scottish Championship thriller at the Caledonian Stadium.
results.title: Highlights: Inverness CT 5-0 Morton

results.description: Inverness Caledonian Thistle move up to second in Scottish Championship after thrashing Morton 5-0.
results.shortTitle: Inverness CT thrash Morton to go second
results.title: Inverness CT 5-0 Morton: Keatings scores twice as Highlanders win

results.description: Watch the goals as Morton fight back from 2-0 down to beat Partick Thistle. (UK only)
results.title: Highlights: Greenock Morton 3-2 Partick Thistle

results.description: Brian McLean's late header caps a brilliant Morton comeback victory against Partick Thistle.
results.shortTitle: Morton stun Thistle in dramatic comeback
results.title: Greenock Morton 3-2 Partick Thistle: Hosts stage stunning comeback

results.description: Hibernian need extra-time to rescue a League Cup quarter-final place in a thrilling win over Morton.
results.shortTitle: Hibs leave it late in eight-goal thriller
results.title: Hibernian 5-3 Greenock Morton (AET): Hosts salvage last eight League Cup place

results.description: Bob McHugh scores a fine hat trick as Morton claimed their first points of the season against Alloa Athletic.
results.shortTitle: McHugh treble gives Morton win over Alloa
results.title: Greenock Morton 4-1 Alloa Athletic: Bob McHugh scores hat trick in win

results.description: Ayr United made a fine - if nervous - start in their target of making the Scottish Championship play offs with a win over Morton.
results.shortTitle: Winning start for Ayr against Morton
results.title: Ayr Utd 4-2 Greenock Morton: Ian McCall's side start with win

results.description: Scotland and Glasgow City midfielder Leanne Crichton's preview and predictions for the Scottish Championship season.
results.title: Scottish Championship: Noisy neighbours, scoring sensations & managerial mavericks
